SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class Metrics

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.Metrics

public final class Metrics
extends Object

Defines constants for all metrics supported by CIMON. Also provides mappings from index of categories in administration app (taken from order of raw xml files) to actual values of metric categories. For description of metrics, as well as type and units for all metrics, see full documentation for this class.

Note: CATEGORYs are not valid metrics, but used for mapping to a group of metrics.

Author:
darts

Constant Field Values

PROC_TOTAL

public static final int PROC_TOTAL
Total cumulative time of processor activity. Compare other utilization metrics to this to acquire ratio. This is a cumulative counter, must measure difference between each update for most recent utilization calculation.
Type: Long
Units: jiffies (approx. 10 ms on many ARM architectures)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROC_USER

public static final int PROC_USER
Total cumulative time processor spent executing at user-level. This is a cumulative counter, must measure difference between each update for most recent utilization calculation.
Type: Long
Units: jiffies (approx. 10 ms on many ARM architectures)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

public static final int PROC_NICE

Type: Long
Units: jiffies (approx. 10 ms on many ARM architectures)

PROXIMITY

public static final int PROXIMITY
Proximity sensor. Reports distance in cm, but some systems only recognize a binary near/far value. These systems report the lowest/highest distance values for near/far respectively.
Type: Float
Units: centimeters

See Also:

oscillationThreshold

public static <T> T oscillationThreshold(int metric)
Returns value used to avoid oscillation between monitoring of condition and anti-condition. This value is added to threshold to help avoid oscillation.

Parameters:
metric - integer representing metric that is monitored by this condition
Returns:
threshold offset value to avoid oscillation
